revised_title: Further Investigations on the Impregnation of the Ovum and the Direct Agency of the Spermatozoon
tldr: The author examines the process of ovum impregnation in amphibians, focusing on the role of the spermatozoon and its direct agency. Through a series of experiments, the author concludes that the spermatozoon possesses a unique form of force, essential for its function, and that its motion is a visible exponent of this power.
